short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KryptPass: Free, privacy-first password manager with breach monitoring and p2p syncing cross devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the future of password management in the era of decentralization. With KryptPass, take ownership of your credentials! KryptPass is a self-custody password management and breach monitoring solution that utilizes a sophisticated private-public key encryption and peer to peer sync that allows for a secure, seamless credential management experience from start to finish.

KryptPass is privacy first:
Getting started with KryptPass doesnâ€™t mean giving up all your personal information. When you create your KryptPass account, we offer you the option of creating either a verified or anonymous account.

KryptPass features:
- Private key generated
- Decentralized password management
- Peer to Peer credential sync (no centralized servers)
- Password generation
- Real-time identity monitoring services
- Credential (email) breach alerts
- Cross-device syncing
- Simple password import/export integration
